mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.company_id, p.name, p.address, p.province, p.city, p.district, p.project_manager_id, u.username as project_manager_name, p.start_date, p.expected_end_date, p.project_type, p.project_scale, p.total_area, p.budget, p.description, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM construction_project p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.project_manager_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{projectId}
mapper.update: UPDATE construction_project SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{projectId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.company_id, p.name, p.address, p.province, p.city, p.district, p.project_manager_id, u.username as project_manager_name, p.start_date, p.expected_end_date, p.project_type, p.project_scale, p.total_area, p.budget, p.description, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM construction_project p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.project_manager_id = u.id WHERE p.company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY p.create_time DESC

SELECT p.id, p.company_id, p.name, p.address, p.province, p.city, p.district, p.project_manager_id, u.username as project_manager_name, p.start_date, p.expected_end_date, p.project_type, p.project_scale, p.total_area, p.budget, p.description, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time, c.name as company_name FROM construction_project p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.project_manager_id = u.id LEFT JOIN company c ON p.company_id = c.id WHERE p.project_manager_id = #{projectManagerId} ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM construction_project WHERE company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id FROM construction_project WHERE project_type_id = #{projectType} AND is_deleted = 0
